name: westerner
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who comes from a country in the western part of the world, especially North America or western Europe: Some of the Buddhists came from Sri Lanka and Southeast Asia, while others were Westerners by birth.
a person who comes from the west of a country, especially the US: Easterners and westerners were equally affected by these changes in American life.

a person from the western part of a country, or (in the US) a person from the part of the country west of the Mississippi River
